name: hbimd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wi(wi(w1, w2), wal(s0, wi(w1, w2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wi(w1, w2), wal(s0, wi(w1, w2))))

-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, wi(w1, w2)))

-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

body.origin:

comment: Deduction form of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ hbim . (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Jan-2018.)
